feature.name: Privilege
feature.description: Advantage on rolls to consort with nobles, negotiate prices, or leverage reputation.

feature.name: Well‑Read
feature.description: Advantage on rolls involving history, culture, or politics of notable people or places.

feature.name: Discipline of Faith
feature.description: Advantage when invoking your creed to command respect or deterrence.

feature.name: Mountain‑Honed
feature.description: Ignore altitude‑ or cold‑related disadvantage and gain advantage on climbing rolls.

feature.name: Know the Tide
feature.description: Advantage on navigation, sailing, and predicting weather at sea.

feature.name: Underhanded
feature.description: Advantage on deception, forgery, and clandestine negotiation rolls.

feature.name: Low‑Light Living
feature.description: You can see in darkness and have advantage on stealth checks underground.

feature.name: Nomadic Pack
feature.description: Once per rest, grant an ally advantage by offering worldly guidance.
